Description.UIName: The Grave of History: Rattler Mk I Fight!
Description.Name: The Grave of History: Rattler Mk I Fight!
Description.Details: This item lets you spawn a specialized contract where you fight against a Rattler Mk 1 Mobile Fortress, complete with its escorting mech forces. This item immediately generates a special contract on the planet of purchase against a Rattler Mk 1 Mobile Fortress. THIS CONTRACT IS EXTREMELY DIFFICULT, QUITE POSSIBLY UNWINNABLE WITHOUT EXTREME MEASURES, YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.
